Name: Elderberry Tea (PH)
Description: It’s sweet and just the smell makes you feel healthier.

DescriptionLocalization.es: It’s sweet and just the smell makes you feel healthier.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: It’s sweet and just the smell makes you feel healthier.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Er ist süß und allein der Geruch lässt dich gesünder fühlen.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: It’s sweet and just the smell makes you feel healthier.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: It’s sweet and just the smell makes you feel healthier.
DescriptionLocalization.it: It’s sweet and just the smell makes you feel healthier.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: It’s sweet and just the smell makes you feel healthier.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: It’s sweet and just the smell makes you feel healthier.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Сладкий и полезный чай. Один лишь его запах заставляет чувствовать вас здоровее.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: It’s sweet and just the smell makes you feel healthier.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 它很甜，仅仅是它的味道就能让你感觉非常健康。
